# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: Nurses Education Program

**Reference Number**: cb-840-10182925

**Solicitation Number**: 21801-23-0150

**Publication Date**: March 8, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: March 25, 2024, 5:00 PM (Pacific Time)

## Background

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) aims to provide high-quality training to front-line nurses in Nursing Clinical Protocols (NCP) for Emergency Situations. We invite eligible suppliers to participate in this bid to provide premium services for this critical program.

## Description of the Requirement

We require a supplier with a Simulation Lab equipped with high-fidelity mannequins to deliver two-day training sessions for up to six nurses per class. The Trainer will create a two-day curriculum covering the emergency situations NCP and provide an outline of the scenarios for our review and approval. The training will cover 16 critical situations, including burns, cardiac arrest, seizure, and trauma.

## Objectives and Tasks

* Schedule and attend meetings as needed with the Project Authority and CSC Health Services representatives.
* Develop a two-day curriculum covering the emergency situations NCP and provide an outline of the scenarios for our review and approval.
* Set up simulations in our institutional environment (e.g., cell block).
* Provide a two-day intensive course focusing on updated nursing protocols and technical skills for enacting the protocols.
* Offer high-fidelity simulation and lab experiences to enhance nurse skills.

## Key Deliverables

* A maximum of 30, two-day clinical simulation and lab sessions for CSC staff.
* Training materials and consumables (except AEDs and suction machines).
* Support during all clinical simulations.
* Instructors for clinical simulations.
* Facilitators with a BC College of Nurses and Midwives license in good standing.

## Selection Criteria

* The supplier must be a University with Nursing Programs for a Bachelor of Science in Nursing.
* The supplier must have an active Simulation Lab with high-fidelity mannequins on site.
* The supplier must have experience delivering education programs to nurses and providing hands-on learning with high-tech Simulation Labs.

## Important Information

* This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).
* This procurement is not subject to any set-asides for Indigenous Suppliers.
